title: Johnny Rivera
text:
Johnny Rivera is an American <a href="salsa%20music">salsa</a> singer of Puerto Rican descent.
Rivera was born in the <a href="Bronx%2C%20NY">Bronx, NY</a>, and attended <a href="high%20school">high school</a> at <a href="Benjamin%20Franklin%20High%20School%20%28New%20York%20City%29">Benjamin Franklin High School</a>. He moved briefly to <a href="Puerto%20Rico">Puerto Rico</a> before returning to <a href="New%20York%20City">New York City</a> to begin a career in music. His first album was released in 1991, and since then he has scored fifteen hit singles, including the <a href="Billboard%20magazine">Billboard</a> Latin Tropical #1 "Se Parecia Tanto a Ti" (1995). Rivera was nominated for Tropical New Artist of the Year at the <a href="Premio%20Lo%20Nuestro%201994">1994 Lo Nuestro Awards</a>. 
In June 11, 2020, Johnny Rivera was the featured <a href="Salsa%20music">singer</a> on <a href="NG2%20%28duo%29">Norberto Vélez's</a> <a href="YouTube">YouTube</a> channel titled "Sesiones Desde La Loma Ep. 9".
